verbs.description: Former President Barack Obama , who [V: has] all but refrained from making public statements about President Donald Trump since leaving office , issued a strong rebuke

Former President Barack Obama , [ARG0: who] has all but refrained from making public statements about President Donald Trump since [V: leaving] [ARG1: office] , issued a strong rebuke
[ARG0: Former President Barack Obama , who has all but refrained from making public statements about President Donald Trump since leaving office] , [V: issued] [ARG1: a strong rebuke]
